name: Dodge the boxes: 2016 US presidential election edition
name_original: Dodge the boxes: 2016 US presidential election edition
description:
Angry people are throwing you boxes from beyond the edge of the screen. What can you do? You can dodge them!

Or you can press D and T to turn yourself into Hillary Clinton and all of the boxes into Donald Trump! That won't help though.

Download for free or you will never know how it feels like to be assaulted with boxes/Trump by people you can't see!
